Introducing...
Mr. & Mrs. Haukilintu!
Tell Me More

The perfect tenants

We are Matti and Julia Haukilintu.
Looking for the most reliable, stress free tenants for your appartment in Sydney? Look no further!

Matti Haukilintu

Husband, software engineer

Julia Haukilintu

Wife, veterinarian

We are 30ish couple from Finland, the land of the Santa Claus and sauna.
We moved to Australia for work in February, as Julia got an internship offer at an animal hospital in Sydney. The work contract is for a year, so we are looking for an appartment near Beaconsfield (NSW 2015) for at least 12 months, maybe more.

We are university educated, financially stable, non-smoking duo with the best qualities for tenancy! Read ahead for proof!

Why us?

The main attributes that makes us the perfect tenants

Clean and tidy

Shoes off at the entrance? Well that's just customary in Finland. We keep the house tidy, recycle everything, and leave our accommodations a bit cleaner than when arriving. It's just common courtesy!

Responsible and reliable

The rent is paid at due date, maybe earlier as bank transfers sometimes take time. Something broke? Of couse it was an accident, and of course we still replace or repair it! In need for another shelf or frame? Better ask landlord first! Even though we live here, we do not own the place. That's just obvious!

Quiet and considerate

Inhouse hobbies include: movies, board games and computer games, and cat videos.

Just the two of us

No children, no pets, no pests. Non-smoking, easy going, peace loving couple. Just the way the perfect tenants should be.

Financials

Moving to another country is not cheap. However, in addition to stable jobs, we have been saving enough money to be abble to support our stay for more than a year, even if our income sources were to vanish for some reason.

As we intend to make our stay comfortable, we are searching for fully equipped and furnished apartment. However, as
